p: The simulated surveys could reproduce the observed age profile of the RFI distribution in the different regions except in High Oyapock (Supplementary Fig. 1). For this region, we explored if a model combining constant MAYV circulation along with a MAYV outbreak could improve the fit. While such model improved the fit for MAYV RFIs, it worsened it for CHIKV RFIs (Supplementary Fig. 2), and no overall improvement in terms of DIC was observed (Supplementary Table 6).
